about_the_game:
Please Fix The Building - it's a relaxing and colorful pazzle. Your task is to repair the building. Unleash your inner architect and revive a building with your building skills! Arrange blocks to your heart's content and add a finishing touch with a roof or slab. For you relaxing music, sounds of nature and colorful graphics!
With endless possibilities for block placement let your imagination run wild as you create a unique and beautiful structure 🏠

FEATURES

  • Over 110 building blocks
  • 9 colorful block variations
  • There are both single blocks and complex blocks consisting of several blocks
  • Here you will find various sounds of nature, birdsong, crickets chirping and much more
  • Day, night, spring, autumn - all seasons of the year and day await you in the game
  • Throw a block and you'll hear it hit trees, fall onto the grass, or splash into the water

FUTURE PLANS

  • Add Mac Support
  • Add Gamepad support

FROM THE DEVELOPER

Thank you for visiting my page!
The game is currently in active development. I will update screenshots and trailers as soon as the content is ready.

P.S.
I will honestly say that I was inspired to develop this game by the Please Fix The Road game. I contacted the developer about the name of the game, he is absolutely fine with it 😊
